website_summaries.verdict: With its 360-degree surround fan, this heater warms the whole room instead of just one direction. Perfect for bathrooms, bedrooms and similar-sized rooms.
pros: Adjustable thermostat and two heat settings
360 degree tip-over switch and overheat protection
360-degree heating warms the whole room instead of one direction
cons: Noisy, clicks when the fan turns on and off

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a faulty unit, but I purchased the same model 2 Winters ago, and it still works like a charm. I decided to purchase another one for my bedroom. I’ve had it for 2 months now and I woke up in the middle of the night to smoke coming from the plug. Appears the unit overheated and melted the plug and cause it to melt. My electrician came and checked out the outlet, which he said was not faulty and said it was the heater that caused the issue. Had I not been home it could have easily started a fire... Too bad Its past the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Burton

customer_reviews.title: Melting space heater
customer_reviews.text: Has done well keeping my girls room warm at night when I run it. Was delievered 11/20/17.. It's January and I just noticed the side of it is all melting. That's what I want to worry about is a fire from a space heater in the room with my kids. No thank you, never again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey sefton

customer_reviews.title: Safety and warmth!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in perfect condition. The heater headed up my room ( basement ) in 20 minutes! Also perfect for kids because of the kind of material it’s made out off and when moved, it shuts off! Please see picture of my room & excuse the mess lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small room when your central heat breaks!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! With unusually cold temps in Florida and our central heat suddenly not working this was a great and quick option to keep the bedrooms warm at night. They do have that slight burning smell other reviews mentioned but it disappated after a few minutes....And they are not too loud even on high. With no heaters in stock in any store near me, I ordered 2 of these and they arrived next day thanks to Amazon's super fast shipping. So far I am very pleased with these little heaters.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: IT WAS GREAT UNTIL IT WASNT
customer_reviews.text: I loved this heater and it was great, until it died for no reason. I bought it in November, ran it during the week most days during the winter while I was at work under my desk, and it was amazing, best desk heater ever! It rested all summer, until I started using it again a few weeks ago. It worked great again, and then suddenly it died this morning. Made a horrible whining sound and then started smelling like burning. Now my feet are cold.
customer_reviews.author: digifuzz

customer_reviews.title: Great heater but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars because everything about it works wonderfully. It's just a tad bit too loud. I'm going to keep it because I can tolerate the sound (it also drowns out the sound of my husbands voice, so there's a silver lining!). But for those of you who are really looking for a quiet space heater, this may not be for you. It really is a great product otherwise! I love the remote control so I can adjust it from my desk without getting up every time. Cuz walking is so over-rated anyhow. Anyways, great product! Worth the buy....just noisy!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 6 months, it started smwllung like smoke and making noise; got it replaced tk now within 3 months, it again started burning and smelling. Never buying these products again, too scary and risky.
customer_reviews.author: Ewelina

customer_reviews.title: This heater is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this heater since Dec 2016! I use it all winter because I get cold and my husband does not, so I wanted to let people know, that it works GREAT! If it ever breaks (knocking on wood) I would definitely buy again! The remote still works, never had to replace the battery yet. You can set the temp and it will reach that temp and go idle, then if the temp in the room gets colder, it pops back on! I HIGHLY recommend this heater...So, that is why I am updating my original review...
customer_reviews.author: LuxorRio

customer_reviews.title: Very toxic, don't use around pets or kids or elderly!
customer_reviews.text: This is so smelly, with strong and constant plastic outgassing every time I turn it on. Gives me a headache and coughing fits. We've run it in the garage for hours and it still smells. This is a poorly designed product using toxic and cheap chemicals. Don't recommend, especially around any small pets or children.
customer_reviews.author: Dee. A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: 3 months of minimum use and the case starts to deform.
customer_reviews.author: hugo alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't throw heat
customer_reviews.text: Gets hot but doesn't stream heat out of machine past 3inches...so may be good if sits directly in front of you but no good for heating up a small room. The 360 range would be awesome if only the fan blew the heat out and away from unit further. Disappointed and returning.
customer_reviews.author: mickid

customer_reviews.title: Heater was working perfectly fine until a couple of days ago
customer_reviews.text: Heater was working perfectly fine until a couple of days ago. The light turns on but the fan does not turn on nor does the heat work anymore. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Worked for three days, then died...Big Puff of Smoke! :(
customer_reviews.text: This Item worked great the first time I used it. After it warmed up outside, I put it in the closet for storage. When it got cold last week, I pulled it out and plugged it in...a big puff of smoke came out the top and the unit hasn't worked since. Not Good.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Its getting heated!
customer_reviews.text: This product my kids have used in their rooms with it being so cold cold being on the top floor with little to no heat able to get up their with the duct-work being a little screwed up. Keeps the temperature at a comfortable level at all times. Turns off by itself when it gets too hot. When it is tilted or on the side it turns off so it is safer because it wont start firers like all the horrible stories I have heard about other space heaters.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: perfect for keeping my space warm in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my office space, perfect for keeping my space warm in the winter! Has emergency cut-off when tips over for safety. Love the three timer modes. You can set this by temperature or time. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice lil heater .
customer_reviews.text: Ok i have read all the negs. Loudness ..smells.yadayadayada...ok heres the truth..its a fan heater so u get a blowing hummmmmm..like a electric fan you woulld use .in summer..the heat is def hot and it does come out from 360.degrees ..it does heat up a large room fine ..convienient little light weight heater ..what else can i say..try it👍.and had no problem with any melting of anything..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started burning while turned off
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I plugged it in I could hear sounds coming from it and saw a slight orange glow from it since it was dark in my room but I thought nothing of it. I turn my back to it and less than 10 seconds later I smell this extremely toxic but in plastic smell and I turn around to find it smoking. I hadn't even turned it on yet! Immediately unplugged it and started fanning the room as the burnt smell was awful and stuck around. Returned it as soon as I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was pleased with first one, but second one only lasted a few months...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this heater to replace our older one that quit after about 3 years of sporadic use. We bought this in January 2019 to help take the chill out of our RV in the evenings and mornings while wintering in Phoenix. We used this on and off for 3 months, then tucked it away. We plugged it in again in October 2019, when it sparked and we smelled smoke. We unplugged the heater and phoned the company. They replaced this heater without question. And so our new replaced heater is working so far. We’ll see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: nurslulu

customer_reviews.title: Love this mighty little heater
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my mudroom/laundry room. Granted it is a small space but when I go in there to do laundry I can bump it up a degree or two and instantly feel the warmth. Love the 360 blower that creates the ability to heat the whole space. It also helps keep the cold edge off of the mudroom, especially here in New England. it is quiet and has two speeds on the fan. I just keep it on low and it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: my own opinion

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time buyer
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Boo! I had to change my below review because this thing just died! I’ve only had it since 10/23 and less then 2 months later it bit the dust. Maybe it’s faulty but I’m very unhappy, I really relied on this in my office in the mornings. ***This is my second time buying this little heater. The first one was fantastic but it died after about 2 years. Was a no brainer to repurchase. Use it in my office at work and it’s perfect, quiet, shuts off when it falls over and is a powerful little sucker.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, had to return.
customer_reviews.text: The heater was perfect, quiet and kept the temperature much more even than my old heater. But it had a burning plastic/hair smell. I thought it might go away. It did not. And the last time I had a heater with the burning plastic smell I returned it, and it ended up being recalled later. I wish I could trust that a new one wouldn't have that problem, but it's too risky for me personally. If yours doesn't have a burnt plastic smell, you would probably like it!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: This heater worked great until today
customer_reviews.text: This heater worked great until today. I only use it about 3 times per week when I'm at work. Bought this in November, 2016. Now, almost exactly 4 months to the day it was delivered, it has stopped working. Its making a loud noise when it is turned on and there is a burning smell. This is the 3rd heater I have purchased (other brands) in the last year. Why is it so difficult to find a heater that actually works and doesn't break in less than a year (or in one instance less than a week). Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and well-designed
customer_reviews.text: These little heaters are great even in a larger space. I ordered one, then two more after I saw how well they worked. You will want to be prepared for a bit of off-gassing. The 360-degree design is smart, providing heat in all directions. I ordered the Honeywell air purifier because of its similar design. Our bedrooms and kitchen stayed sufficiently warm with one heater in each room last winter, which was unusually bad. I am considering purchasing a couple more this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Plastic melted and warped, BAD Heater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in March, was ok, but needed it right by you and on high. Skip to now and it is all warped melted plastic and has now started smoking... threw away, do not buy this...
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: We just got this and it is easy to set up and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: We just got this and it is easy to set up and very quiet. Puts out a good amount of heat. Only negative is that it was unclear how LOW it would go, and it appears to only go down to 60 degrees and we had wanted something that set at about 56.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Was nice for the couple of days that it did
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it for less than a week and it stopped working! Garbage! Don't buy! It was nice the few days that it did work.
customer_reviews.author: T Moore

customer_reviews.title: Melting Plastic, Toxic Odor
customer_reviews.text: Bad News: Unit smelled like burning plastic, so toxic it could not be used indoors. Turned it on outside for a few hours off and on over a few days to see if the odor would resolve itself but it did not. It only intensified. Did not see any melting or smoking, just an extremely strong odor of melting plastic. When we purchased the unit we didn't use it right away, as a result we went beyond the return window at Amazon. Good News: I was able to contact Honeywell support 1.800.477.0457 and they were super nice and because it was in a 3 year warranty window they are sending a new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mel T.

customer_reviews.title: VERY WEAK BLOWING
customer_reviews.text: First of all it hardly blows and couldn't even heat up the inside of my garbage can. Then it came with the box so damaged that I can't believe it would be packed up I an Amazon box to cover that, very unprofessional, is possible the unit is damaged but I don't even want to try to order another one I'm just going to return it very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 1 year and 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Was great until the power switch shorted out just now. The switch used to turn on the power started having too much play between low & high settings and would not work unless I jiggled the switch in the correct location. This would cause an electrical smell, and after a few days, broke. It’s not the best design putting the switch on the side of the machine bc of the amount of pressure needed to turn it puts too much strain on it. Will try to work with Honeywell to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie M

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dents.
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with several dents so a replacement ordered. Second one also arrived with a dent although with intact packaging. So my guess is that the units they sell here are factory discards or a refurbished one. Also the fan on the first one was powerful but the second one is low. Inconsistent performance of the same model units makes me want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Loud, burning smell but usable for small size and light cold
customer_reviews.text: My only option as it’s hard to find one that can be shipped to LA due to state law. It’s portable and can automatically turn off not leveled up straight, so that’s safe to use on carpet. However, the noise and the burning smell are total turnoff to me. There’s something with the electricity that whenever I turned it on high level preset, it started to cut off my whole apt’s electricity. It worked ok for my small room, tho I noticed the heating efficiency got worse after 2-3 months of use. I usually turned it on low level for about 15 mins before getting back to the room for long.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N

customer_reviews.title: I cannot get over how wonderful it is
customer_reviews.text: I've spent over $100 each on at least three heaters in the last five or six years. Each have out in me. Based on the reviews here I decided to try this space heater. I cannot get over how wonderful it is. It is a tiny bit loud but it's easy to get used to. I love it. I live in Chicago where it's cold, especially right now. I love this little heater and for the money I cannot get over it. I don't even use the highest setting because the lowest setting is really warm. I would buy this if you're looking for a really good heater at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement after less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: 1st Edit: Quick delivery and hassle free replacement recieved. Will update after about a week, hoping the replacement isn't defective. Returning after less than a week for a replacement. I trust this brand so I hope it's just a fluke that I received a defective product. Started loud humming noise after 5 days of use. I'll update review after I receive replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This heater worked great the first few weeks but then after awhile it ...
customer_reviews.text: This heater worked great the first few weeks but then after awhile it stopped working. Idk what is wrong because it does heat up but the heat doesn’t extend to the rest of the room. Now it just makes noise and does nothing
customer_reviews.author: Arvey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazzard!  Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these thinking Honeywell was a respectable product and they worked well for 1st winter. Neither lasted thru the second winter. On both of them the thermostat stopped working so they never shut down at temperature setting. Next the fans stopped working and they would keep heating up without any safety mechanism to shut them down. The second one failed several weeks after the first. They became so hot that I think they would of caused a fire if I did not unplug them. I still have them if Amazon or Honeywell would like to test them!
customer_reviews.author: nicholas kelly

customer_reviews.title: Use all the time
customer_reviews.text: We got this to warm the bathroom up in the winter before I go in. I hate getting out of the shower into a cold room. Our room is on two outside walls so it would get cold. We have it on a wifi outlet and it automatically turns on when my alarm goes off in the morning and then off. I do always remember to turn of the auto feature when not around. Since I set all my lights on timers. Working great for me so far. love the range and the heat produced. Doesn't get too hot at the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Works for what it is meant for
customer_reviews.text: I had orginally bought this for my tiny green house. But it did not keep it warm enough for my plants. Not the fault of the heater. I brought it to my room and it definitely works well in a small room. I did not notice how warm it was in my room until I walked out of it. Love this tiny little heater. Highly recommend you get one. Just incase you have a problem make sure you have this on a sturdy surface. There is a button on the bottom that allows it to work. If the button is not pressed in, it turns off automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Venny

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm on those cold nights
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for small to medium sized rooms, it has several safety features built into it. Which makes it safe to use in a child’s room. (If they tip it over it will turn off) The temperature sensor is very sensitive again a plus as it will add an additional level of safety being near anything or preventing it from getting too hot. I am confident in the performance of this machine and for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Worst heater
customer_reviews.text: The worst heater, I recommend people not TiVo buy it. I bought mine on October the 23rd and stop working December 11th. I couldn’t return to get my money because the return policy is for 30 days. I lost my precious money 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's been so cold on the west coast, so I had no choice but to invest in space heaters. This little heater is powerful. It gets hotttttt! My only complaint is that there is a little smell that emits from it. It almost smells like you're in a pool area...like a chlorine smell. Not sure where it comes from but I purchased two different heaters (one tower) and the other doesn't smell like that.
customer_reviews.author: T Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this product is great. It is HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great. It is HOWEVER, a little louder than I hoped for. Besides that, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great heater for our bathroom 12x12 is kind of noisy for a bedroom as some reviewers stated but for what we needed it’s the best heater I have purchased: initially it had a smell but that’s normal for a new product> heated up our bathroom quickly and so far it been running for an hour < we live in the south where 38 is cold but we plan to use this in the morning to take the chill out . Hope it will last as long as the 3 year warranty?/
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great little money saving heater.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd honeywell 360 heater, our 1st one quit working on low, but otherwise continues to work just fine. We like the fact that it is a safe little heater, if jostled the unit shuts off. Also it doesn't run your electric bill sky high. Hope they keep making these units. Really nice to keep a medium size room warm, we have one for the kitchen, living room, and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best space heater for the money
customer_reviews.text: Where do i start.. this is over all a great product.. i have a decent size room that is poorly heated in the winter so this really worked great.. i can rely on the remote if i feel like being lazy and it has a timer so if you think you will leave it on when you leave the house.. no worries, just set the timer for 1,2,4 or 8 hours. I’m absolutely loving it and for the price, worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Shopsometimes89

customer_reviews.title: HONEYWELL HHF360v HEATER:  2 blower settings, but no difference in force of heated, blown air.
customer_reviews.text: This small heater is probably a good DEAL, for the money, but I was very disappointed, that the 2 different "Heat Settings" (which are really blown, heated AIR settings (LOW and HIGH) are the same. I.e., why are there two different positions one can use, IF the "High" does not increase the power of the air blown (or the heat, for that matter). at all. Disappointing, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Lenox Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Heater Failed After Only 4 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: This heater has all the features I needed, and would be a great heater at a good price if it worked. The product began continually short cycling after only 4 weeks of use. Making a warranty claim was impossible as the manufacturer seemed to purposefully make it as difficult as possible so consumers would just give up. Threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: farmer cindy

customer_reviews.title: I used the heater last night and the room was very comfortable. This product came fairly quickly (as is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my heater yesterday. The only regret I have is that I didn't purchase this sooner. My bedroom has always been so cold that it's made it uncomfortable for sleeping. I used the heater last night and the room was very comfortable. This product came fairly quickly (as is the usual case for amazon products). At first it seemed as though I waited for a long time, but this wasn't the case whatsoever when I saw the purchase date.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad heater. Comes with a remote. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If I could change this product I would give an 8 hour shut off for safety purposes, change it to a 180 degree or 90 degree heater, and make the thermostat on it more accurate. Even so, I still use it daily in my frigid office. I guess I'm just super paranoid about office heaters.
customer_reviews.author: nativetexanwoman

customer_reviews.title: Product came opened with previous customer's information still stuck to the box.
customer_reviews.text: I received this package which had obviously been returned from another customer. The box had been opened and poorly taped back together with the previous customer's information still stuck to the box. I ordered this for my mom for Christmas. Didn't want to make the box look worse than it did so I didn't open it. Something tells me that this heater is not going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Sutton

customer_reviews.title: REALLY heats up a small room
customer_reviews.text: I love a warm bathroom when I am taking a shower.....can’t STAND stepping out into a frigid room! This heater is perfect for making my bathroom cozy, taking up very little space and putting out DELICIOUS heat. Great heater for excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Rock lady

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these and honestly have not used the central heat in my house no matter the room this little guy will eventually conquer it id say its almost too much for a small room but it has temp control but at full blast you will wake up in a sweat and it has great safety features and cut of if tipped over! Cant be beat for the price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Temp and heat level dials are nice....a little noisy though
customer_reviews.text: Nice little heater that provides pretty good warmth, but it is loud. Our master bath gets really cold so this sits on a high shelf, but we have to keep the door closed or else you can hear this kick on....where it has woken me up. Serves its purpose, but there are quieter versions. On the plus side, you can set a temp range and it turns off when it get to that set temp which works better in smaller rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Mel L.

customer_reviews.title: Works, light bills down and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is pretty powerful and he's my bedroom and I have my son's bed and my bed in our room and it gets hot quickly this could quickly be a heater for a bigger area I'm having trouble trying to keep the right temperature inside here due to not really knowing how to work it but all in all I like it I'm happy with it and it's not making my light bill go sky high so that is a big plus!.
customer_reviews.author: Mistic Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for its size!
customer_reviews.text: This space heater is suitable for small spaces, but you would have to look elsewhere if you're looking to warm up a medium-sized room. The 360 surround heat is a double edge sword, it provides even heat distribution , but then you're wasting heat in places that you do not need it. The setting is to control heat output, not fan speed. It does put out a hint of burning smell at high. The noise level is not unnoticeable, but it is not too intrusive. The tipped-over safety is a welcomed feature that shuts off the space heater automatically. The heat output is good on the high setting, acceptable at low setting.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Product works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southern California, and I do not use my furnace very much, I prefer a small heater like this one, portable, and easy to move around, to whatever room I am in. It is somewhat noisy, but I am not bothered by that. One buyer complained about smell, but I did not notice any, only the very first time I turned it on which I believe is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the best heater but it works for now. Thought about returning it but for the price it is what it is. I personally like to sit next to the heater and the output of heat on this one is surround. I prefer a direct output of heat. It was shipped with original box only with shipping label slapped on. That’s kinda cheap IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Surf1974

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite heat up the room as I would like. My other space heater does a much better job. The 360 fan is nice but again - would be better if it were a big stronger. The fan is somewhat loud. Good buy for the price but if I could do it all over I'd spend the extra $10 to have the room heated faster.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $10
customer_reviews.text: I had the knob version before and really liked it for a small apartment but had to replace 2 under warranty due to issues with faulty knobs. The remote version is worth the extra $10 to save that hassle alone but the temperature settings are so nice. In smaller spaces you can’t beat the heat that comes from one of these and I save so much money compared to the in-wall units my building has.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Faulty dial switch
customer_reviews.text: Had it one year and it is shorting out with the dial switch, terrible smell of burned wiring. Using in my office, so it has to be a safe tip over heater. It was great until it wasn't. I am going to try the electronic version, though, because the heat output from the broken one was pretty great...
customer_reviews.author: Laniwrx

customer_reviews.title: Love his!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Opened it right away my family room is cold and this heats it up well! I live in a town house so not huge room but bigger than a bedroom! Not noisy no small. Love it and i have had many space heaters. Plus it is nice looking not ugly like others i have had
customer_reviews.author: Regina Mazzuca

customer_reviews.title: you sometimes get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this heater for a little over one month and it totally gave out today. Unfortunately I purchased another Honeywell product last week and had some trouble with installation. If you have a problem with their products be prepared to be on hold for their help line for over an hour. I'll keep this in mind before I purchase another Honeywell product. In the meantime.. I'm still on hold.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Heckmann

customer_reviews.title: It makes a concerning noise
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a couple weeks but now it's making this noise that really concerns me. Sounds like something is lose and flapping around? If you're not paying attention it sounds like a fire starting. There is no fire starting but the noise is really concerning and I can't figure out what it is. The heater has never been dropped or bumped so I'm not sure why it's doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Aries

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heater which easily heats a 20 x 20 room
customer_reviews.text: I am sure it can heat a larger area. However, my 20' x 20' area it works great in. Unlike other heaters, this heater heats 360 all around as opposed to only out the front! Honeywell is a great company from many many decades ago!
customer_reviews.author: TheMan

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and affordable space heater
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely safe, at the low setting where I use them, you can put your hand on it all day without being burned or a combustible material being in danger of being ignited. Very reliable, I own several of them and they last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Works well especially in small rooms
customer_reviews.text: I use it to heat my small room and it warms up in a few mins, the temp control feature prevents it from running constantly and will stop running when it reaches the configured temp and runs when the temp drops below the control temp setting.
customer_reviews.author: Gabzor

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It does not beep when you turn ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It does not beep when you turn it on or off—which was what I was looking for. However, when you turn it of (from the remote or on the actual heater), you have to hold the power button down for 6 seconds. It doesn’t seem like that big of a deal, but six seconds is actually a super long time to have to hold down a button just to turn off a heater.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna G.

customer_reviews.title: Died after three uses.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice to test it out for about 20 minutes each time (in small bathroom) worked great. Then I got around to installing it in my grow tent. I Bench tested the heated with the remote for the first time and it worked great. Then I installed it in the tent and nothing! Dead!
customer_reviews.author: theladder

customer_reviews.title: Don't last long. Died after little use
customer_reviews.text: After two years or using it very sparingly, we've had two die one after another. We live in arizona and only need to run them for about 30 minutes before we turn them off. Now neither come on anymore, but the light still turns on, so it's getting power. We thought the first one stopped working was a fluke, but apparently ot wasn't and these are poorly made and die quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: I liked the heater. When my apartment shutdown heat prior to turning on air conditioning we had a cold front move in. This heater was a lifesaver. Kept me cozy warm.
customer_reviews.author: Patartsy3

customer_reviews.title: NO temperature control!
customer_reviews.text: This heater has NO temperature control. We set it at 72 and just woke up to see it was 96!! I am PISSED! This is not a safe product! Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Stewart

customer_reviews.title: great heater! heats the whole garage!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this heater in the garage! Love that it has a timer function!!! So he can set the timer in case he forgets to turn it off. Better than just having a thermostat, that could have the heater turn on again. We don;t really use the remote control, so I can't rate that function.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good small-room heater
customer_reviews.text: Good for heating a bathroom or small room, this heater has no bells and whistles (doesn't rotate like larger Honeywell heaters, and it doesn't have tip-over auto-off....but it is pretty short and squat so perhaps the manufacturer thinks it is unnecessary. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: This is broken already
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in January - It's April now and this started smelling like it was burning up. It has a three year warranty, so I'm going to try to get it replaced. The reason why I purchased this particular model is because I was replacing the 12 year old version of the same model. I figured if the first one lasted 12 years, I was buying a good brand/model. I guess we'll see if the warranty comes through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCTS !!
customer_reviews.text: ORDERED ONE FOR MY WIFE'S OFFICE. 12 BY 20 FOOT. IT PUT OUT SO MUCH HEAT ON HIGH, SHE FIRST TURNED IT TO LOW, & THEN OFF. HEATED WHOLE OFFICE, QUICKLY & COMPLETELY. 360 HEAT DIRECTION IS FABULOUS !! I THE ORDERED ONE FOR MY OFFICE. THEN FOR SUMMER USAGE 2 HONEYWELL -12 INCH FANS. ALL QUALITY MERCHANDISE & VERT REASONABLY PRICED. AND QUICK DELIVERY !! GARY W. MARUSKA TEXAS
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Maruska

customer_reviews.title: They keep getting worse...
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these heaters for my office about once every 3-4 years, for the price I don't mind having to replace them. It gets a lot of use, but they keep getting flimsier. This one just doesn't put out as much heat as previous one. It is relatively quiet , and it does work, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed with this product. purchased this heater in Jan 18. Been using it for less than 4 months and the power knob start to act up. and then now does not even able to turn to start the power. Feeling stuck with a new heater that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Ari59

customer_reviews.title: This little heater warms a room quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Great little 365° heater. Easy to move from room to room, and the timer (1,2,4 hours) makes it easy to set it and not worry about burning the house down if you leave. Puts out some good heat-will "hibernate" when temp is reached. Recommend for a small room heater for under 60 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Christina

customer_reviews.title: Died after just over a month
customer_reviews.text: I received this on March 1st and by today April 9th it started to crap out. Making crackling sounds and a burnt smell out of no where while it was on the low setting. Really upset that now I can't return it due to a 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Febles

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Nov 2016 for a small, attached greenhouse. I use this to heat the greenhouse on cold nights in the winter. This has worked like a champ! Has several settings, so flexible to use, and the remote makes it easy. Definitely, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: The best little heater
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have a small beach cottage and we needed a little heater to help on cold days. This heater is great! It heats about 400 Sq ft. perfectly. It is quiet and the thermostat works great. I am very happy with this purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: arascop

customer_reviews.title: Temperature controls inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our toddlers room because it gets colder in his room, but unfortunately the temperature controls are inaccurate. We set it to 72 and the room is 69, it won't turn on...we have to set it to 75 in order for it to kick on and maintain a comfortable temperature. I still haven't figured it out yet, I am hoping I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: This is adequate, not great. It’s good to use in the bathroom on a cold morning. I hate freezing when I get out of the shower and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: jlb

customer_reviews.title: Not enough heat
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. I don't like the heat output and instruction to keep unit 3 feet away from wall. Now I wish I'd bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my office at work because it's ALWAYS cold in here. This little heater cranks! It has auto shut off when it reaches a certain temp in the room. It will auto come back on when it cools down. Puts out a good amount of heat. It's perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 75 days
customer_reviews.text: It was fine till about 75 days in and the fan konked out and the heat lamps don't stay light.. Oh well, lets try another product..
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Portlance

customer_reviews.title: A little heater that can
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a rather large dorm room, it can get quite cold in central PA. This little heater is great, it can warm up a dorm room with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom around 30 minutes. The heater will also turn off when it is sideways which is excellent. It is a bit noisy, but I got use to it as a white noise machine
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice by noisy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice features. Heats well. Relatively noisy. Too noisy for my office to hear music playing at a relatively low level. I bought a different heater with a much quieter fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very weak blowing power.
customer_reviews.text: Skip this and get the simple style heaters that have a box type shape with a fan blade blowing over heating elements. They put out much more heat quicker than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: best heater ever
customer_reviews.text: Oh this is an amazing heater - my gas bill was much lower this month as we DID NOT USE IT AT ALL! I connect this heater to the Wifi Plug and timed it on my phone. I had 4 heaters around the house strategically switch on at certain times.. Didnt use the gas the whole month in NorthCarolina during Dec/Jan
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Virji

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient room heater
customer_reviews.text: If it gets knocked over, it automatically shuts off instantly. Gets room very warm and cozy. I purchased two, we all enjoy this item.😁

customer_reviews.title: Heater died after one season.
customer_reviews.text: Blank screen, won't kick on. Lasted 3 months of intermittent use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob James

customer_reviews.title: Good $40 heater , will never let you down
customer_reviews.text: This is a damnnn good heater ... wish it had an extra 10% power output in terms of overall heat and coverage ... but a 2-3 bedroom apartment, this heater got u covered ..... it’ll take 1/2 hr but it got you covered >.<
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great theater.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast. Worked perfectly when turned on. Very quiet fan noise. Full 1500 watts of heat. Thermostat works.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Loudly warm
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a upgrade but this model is super louder sucks more energy and barely spits out heat. When it does it’s the 10 min mark.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great heat
customer_reviews.text: This little heater is awesome it says for smaller spaces but is powerful enough to heat larger spaces. Great item for the money. I had bought as a gift. Everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small area
customer_reviews.text: The heater is fine and functions well. However I purchased it for a large bathroom, and this is simply not strong enough for the space.
customer_reviews.author: J Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Its a great heater that heats up the room quickly. I was able to use it for 5 to 6 months before the button stuck and i was unable to turn it on. The next thing i know, it stops working. So, now I have to buy a new one. If it would have lasted an year, I would have given it 5. but 5 months only during winter is kind of a short life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great! I figured I would need to have another ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great! I figured I would need to have another heating source because my other does not seem to heat a larger space. But this has been the only I've needed to use. High gets the place warm and the LOW setting with adjustments to the sub heat is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell on "high" but works nicely on "low"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sit under my desk at work, because the office is really cold. This has two settings, and frankly it is hard to tell the difference between high and low. On High - the unit gives off a burning smell, so I just keep it on low. On low, it works well. I wouldn't say it's quiet, but the noise is pleasant and doesn't bother anyone. Adding to this review. It stopped working in month 11. For the price, maybe that's fair -- you get 11 months of heat. You decide.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: PERSONAL ROOM HEATER
customer_reviews.text: Good heat output, quiet fan delivery of heat, good value. It's great for setting near sofa or desk for warming up on cold days and nights.
customer_reviews.author: Kenninsf

product_meta.title: Honeywell HHF360V 360 Degree Surround Fan Forced Heater with Surround Heat Output Charcoal Grey Energy Efficient Portable Heater with Adjustable Thermostat & 2 Heat Settings
product_meta.description: Style Name:ManualHoneywell 360 degree surround fan forced heater W/improved engine design for superior, efficient heating.
feature_bullets: ENERGY EFFICIENT HEAT: Providing 360 all around warmth, this portable heater is ideal for small to mid sized rooms. The Low setting does not require as much electricity to operate, so it is more energy efficient and a better option for saving energy

EASY TO USE: Delivering enhanced safety features & easily controlled comfort, this heater features an adjustable thermostat as well as 2 heat settings, a 360 degree tip over switch, overheat protection and an easy grab, cool touch carry handle

INCREASE YOUR COMFORT: Using portable heaters in your home can help increase comfort & supplement home heating needs. There is a range of Honeywell heaters covering personal, ceramic, fan forced, radiant and infrared to meet all your heating needs

SMART SAVINGS: Portable heaters are a smart and easy way to add warmth to any space. By turning down your whole house thermostat a few degrees and heating just the room you are in, a Honeywell heater can help you save money while providing soothing warmth
HONEYWELL QUALITY: Help improve heating & energy savings in your home, bedroom or office using a Honeywell portable heater

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,601 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
